channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (4 Mar 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-03-04/#comment-337">Justin McGuire</a>.
Hey Justin, great to have you on here and thanks for sharing your work. Great portfolio you've got there!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Justin McGuire.

Hey Justin, great to have you on here and thanks for sharing your work. Great portfolio you’ve got there!

item.title: By: Tony Eppright
item.dc:creator: Tony Eppright
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-03-04/#comment-337">Justin McGuire</a>.
Hey Justin, great looking site. If you haven't done it already, may I suggest tweeting your new site with #genesiswp and @GenesisWPguide .
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Justin McGuire.

Hey Justin, great looking site. If you haven’t done it already, may I suggest tweeting your new site with #genesiswp and @GenesisWPguide .

item.title: By: Tony Eppright
item.dc:creator: Tony Eppright
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-03-04/#comment-336">Stephanie Hellwig</a>.
Anytime, Stephanie! Thanks for the great theme...so nice to see so many great Genesis themes being released!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Stephanie Hellwig.

Anytime, Stephanie! Thanks for the great theme…so nice to see so many great Genesis themes being released!

item.title: By: Tony Eppright
item.dc:creator: Tony Eppright
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-03-04/#comment-335">Robin</a>.
Thank YOU, Robin! Appreciate the new plugin very much, looks really great!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Robin.

Thank YOU, Robin! Appreciate the new plugin very much, looks really great!

item.title: By: Justin McGuire
item.dc:creator: Justin McGuire
item.description:
I work for a Genesis focused development company out of Minnesota and we recently launched a new site for one of our clients that I think is great and is having a big impact with their customers. http://seedsalescamp.com/
You can also see a small sample of some of our past projects here: https://vimm.com/work/
item.content:encoded:
I work for a Genesis focused development company out of Minnesota and we recently launched a new site for one of our clients that I think is great and is having a big impact with their customers. http://seedsalescamp.com/

You can also see a small sample of some of our past projects here: https://vimm.com/work/

item.title: By: Stephanie Hellwig
item.dc:creator: Stephanie Hellwig
item.description: Another great week for the #genesiswp community! Thanks for mentioning Boho Beauty Tony.
item.content:encoded: Another great week for the #genesiswp community! Thanks for mentioning Boho Beauty Tony.

item.title: By: Robin
item.dc:creator: Robin
item.description: Wow, thanks for the mention here, Tony!
item.content:encoded: Wow, thanks for the mention here, Tony!
